rukus.text: Regx dir Bring him me When messenger ven him li dir Ir your lord pet him investigate women fason their man! My Lord est fully aware da their schemes

(Regx) dir (al women Ki do vi kon incident when vi pen seduce Joseph? Ili dir "DI forbid ni ne kon de anything evil committed per him. wife governor dir Nun truth prevailed Mi est unu pen seduce him li est truthful)
Mi esper li realize ke mi neniam perfid him his absence DI ne ben schemes betrayers
Mi ne pretend innocence myself. Sin est advokat de vice escept por those ating mercy my Lord My Lord est Forgiver Merciful
Regx dir Bring him me mi lu him work me When li talked kun him li dir Hodiaux vi hav prominent pozici us
Li dir Far me treasurer mi spert en this are kaj knowledgeable
Ni do establ Joseph ter regul as li wished Ni dusx our mercy whomever ni testament, ni neniam fail recompense des righteous
Additionally rekompenc Hereafter est eben bon those kred plumb righteous life
